rules.justification: Do not assign a text to a target with smaller size. - Temporarily demoted, legacy to be fixed with PRIO
Placeholders should have a comment explaining their content. - Temporarily demoted, legacy to be fixed later?
You must write a tooltip in the Tooltip property for all controls of type Action and Field that exist on page objects. - Temporarily demoted, legacy to be fixed later?
Use a text constant or label for format string in StrSubstNo. - Temporarily demoted, legacy to be fixed later?
